name: test_e2e_with_logs[SQLI_TIME_011]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_011` |
| **Name** | Lowercase sleep function |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `sleep(5)`
- **Encoded**: `sleep%285%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~17000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:08:41.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_011-1765112921222-uo2qlt pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_011 uri=/?q=sleep%285%29 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
